task.title: How to style your hair in a fashionable way
task.shortdesc: Using hair gel to style your hair is a surefire way to look good and attract new friends.

step.cmd: Find the hair gel and comb under the bathroom sink upstairs.
Unscrew the hair gel container's lid.
Wet your hands and run them through your hair.
Scoop quarter-sized dollop of gel from the container and slather through your hair.
step.info: Using too much hair gel will make your hair look greasy.

step.cmd: Use the comb to style your hair in the direction you want.

taskbody.result: Your hair is going to look super cool.
